content.json:
## Additional diagrams about generic LastPass usage
---

content.query:
LastPassNativePoller_CL
| where isnotempty(Data_s)
| summarize count() by Data_s
| order by count_
| render piechart
content.title: Overview of the sites used

content.query:
LastPassNativePoller_CL
| where Username_s != "API"
| summarize count() by Username_s
| order by count_
| render piechart
content.title: Overview of the active users

content.query:
LastPassNativePoller_CL
| where Action_s != "Reporting"
| summarize count() by Action_s
| order by count_
| render piechart
content.title: Overview of the activity types

items.name: Additional diagrams about generic LastPass usage

content.query:
let IPs = SigninLogs | project IPAddress;
LastPassNativePoller_CL
| where Action_s != "Reporting"
| where IP_Address_s !in (IPs)
| summarize Count = count() by bin(todatetime(Time_s), 1d)
| render timechart
content.title: Sign-ins using an IP which has not been observed before

content.query:
LastPassNativePoller_CL
| where Action_s == "Log in"
| join (SigninLogs | where AppDisplayName == "LastPass Enterprise") on $left.IP_Address_s == $right.IPAddress
| extend isCompliant = iff(DeviceDetail.isCompliant == "true", "Compliant", "Non-Compliant")
| summarize count() by isCompliant
content.title: Overview of compliancy state of device used to login

content.query:
LastPassNativePoller_CL
| where Action_s == "Login to Admin Console"
| summarize Count = count() by Username_s
